sentences.en: He has finally cracked the system after years of painstaking research.
sentences.cn: 经过数年的艰苦研究，他最终破译了该系统。

sentences.en: The leases come with painstaking stipulations to mitigate any possible environmental harm to species like the polar bear.
sentences.cn: 这些租约附带了细致的条款，以减轻对北极熊等物种的任何可能的环境伤害。

sentences.en: This intuition is not arbitrary or irrational, but is based on years of painstaking practice and hands-on experience that build skills.
sentences.cn: 这种直觉不是武断的或非理性的，而是建立在多年艰苦的实践和建立技能的实际经验的基础上的。
